name: Lot'zAmonsters
description:
20 Weapons
From the basic machinegun to a saw launcher each weapon is designed to be fun to use and unique

8 Kinds of monsters

Each one giving a diferent vibe with its own music theme

Local Co-op
Enjoy the game with a friend (only avaliable using an XBOX 360/ONE controller)
